  1. City Council

City Council

All governing and lawmaking powers of the City of Stephenville shall be vested in the council which shall consist of eight (8) councilmen and a mayor, and said body shall be known as the "city council."

Regular council meetings are held on the first Tuesday of each month.

  • Term Lengths: 2 year terms with 3-term limits (beginning with the 2024 election)
  • Number of Positions: 8 members plus the mayor, all elected at large

  1. Tue, Jan. 27

    Chamber of Commerce State of the City Luncheon

  2. Wed, Jan. 28

  3. Fri, Jan. 30

  4. Tue, Feb. 3

    City Council Meeting
  5. Mayor's Youth Council
